titles.title: It's Not By Might And It's Not By Power

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It's not by might, and it's not by power, but by my Spirit
Saith the Lord of Hosts.
It's not by might, and it's not by power, but by my Spirit
Saith the Lord.
This mountain shall be removed.
This mountain shall be removed.
This mountain shall be removed
By my Spirit saith the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
No es con espada, ni con ejercito,
Mas por mi Santo Espiritu.
No es con espada, ni con ejercito,
Mas por mi Santo Espiritu.
Y este monte, y este monte se movera, y este montes se movera, por mi Santo Espiritu.
